title: Account transfers :/
body:
HI i just wanna know why the account transfer still on cooldown :/
sever:EUW

replies.body:
Kokua with the assist! HollyMonster was able to give another update on when we can expect those transfers to be working again not too long ago in her [**post up top**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/rlu6awv4-transfer-service-update). 

> Update:
> 
> There is still a bit more work that needs to be done to get the service usable again, and the team is hoping to have it back up and running by late January/early February.
> 
> Also - when the service does come back up we are planning on offering transfers at a discounted rate for a couple weeks. There will be a news post when we have more information on exact timing, so keep an eye out for that!

If you check out the [stickied thread](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/rlu6awv4-transfer-service-update) on this topic, you'll see that they hit another issue, and had to unfortunately increase the wait time. They did however confirm that there would be a discounted price for a while when it does become available.
Just expect them to say after we enter febuary that we hit another maokai snag and have to say its late february early march then repeat.
